item.description: Please Join me on Monday Jan 26 2008 at 12 pm at the Venetian restuarant at 909 Broad St East weymouth Ma for a Business and Social networking meet-up where we will get together and grow our businesses. Be prepared to talk about your business and what your goals are for the coming year. Expect to pay a modest amount for a delicious dinner which you can order off the menu. It is important for Business owners like ourselves to meet and know many "friends" so we can to promote each other at this networking meetup
item.how_to_find_us: I will be sitting just inside the door waiting for people to get there.
item.name: Business networking and social meeting January Meetup
